}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "NanoPi R5C" and "2209" are on top and bottom of board.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3568 @2.0GHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A55) *GPU: Mali-G52 (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.0); NPU Support 0.8T :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 32GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash, TF card (128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4X) SDRAM *Network: 2x 2.5Gbps Ethernet ports *WiFi: [[Realtek]] RTL8822CE 2T2R (802.11abgn/ac), BT 5.0 *USB: 2x USB 3.2 ports *Power Source: USB (Type-C) support PD, 5V/9V/12V
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.friendlyelec.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_R5C ''NanoPi R5C'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/12/01/nanopi-r5c-mini-router-2-5gbe-m-2-wireless-module/ ''NanoPi R5C mini router'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[https://liliputing.com/nanopi-r5c-is-tiny-pc-with-dual-2-5-gbps-ethernet-ports-hdmi-2-0-and-rk3568b2-for-49-and-up/ ''NanoPi R5C is tiny PC with dual 2.5 Gbps Ethernet'' on '''Liliputing''']
